# Development Setup

You need [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/) **version 6+**.

After cloning the repo, run:

```bash
$ npm install
```

Common used NPM scripts:

```bash
# serve docs with hot reload at localhost:8080
$ npm run dev

# build lib in /lib folder
$ npm run build:lib

# build docs in /dist folder
$ npm run build:docs

# build docs and lib
$ npm run build
```
